title: 3DTILES_implicit_tiling_content_count subtree extension
description: Allows tiles in a subtree to specify a variable number of contents.

values.description: Index of a buffer view that contains the content counts.

availableCount.description: A number indicating how many 1 bits exist in the availability bitstream.

constant.description: Integer indicating whether all of the elements are available (1) or all are unavailable (0).
